plugins.name: Notion Book Cover Formatter
plugins.description: Notion Book Cover Formatter solves the common problem of adapting vertical book covers (typically in 2:3 ratio) to Notion's responsive format. Instead of struggling with manual resizing and background creation, this plugin automatically:Positions your book cover perfectly within the Notion image dimensionsCreates a beautiful and consistent background from the original coverStep by step instructions:Upload a book cover imagePlugin creates a frame containing the formatted imageExport the frameUpload to Notion as "Files & Media"
plugins.tagline: Notion-ready book covers with a single image upload

131187.name: Notion Book Cover Formatter
131187.description: Notion Book Cover Formatter solves the common problem of adapting vertical book covers (typically in 2:3 ratio) to Notion's responsive format. Instead of struggling with manual resizing and background creation, this plugin automatically:Positions your book cover perfectly within the Notion image dimensionsCreates a beautiful and consistent background from the original coverStep by step instructions:Upload a book cover imagePlugin creates a frame containing the formatted imageExport the frameUpload to Notion as "Files & Media"

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to process image data from local file uploads using the fetch API to create formatted book covers.

131187.tagline: Notion-ready book covers with a single image upload

plugins.name: Blink Notes
plugins.description: Blink Notes is the fastest way to capture ideas and attach notes directly to your Figma frames — instantly and effortlessly.With Blink Notes, you can:Quickly create notes linked to specific framesOrganize thoughts without breaking your design flowKeep your feedback, ideas, and to-dos right where you need themStay focused with a clean, minimal, distraction-free interfaceDesigned for speed, collaboration, and creativity, BlinkNotes helps you streamline your design process and never lose an idea again.Add Blink Notes to your workflow and start designing smarter today.

accepted.name: Siddhant giri
accepted.description: Product Designer and a Frontend Developer from India.

plugins.tagline: Capture and link notes to your Figma frames — in a blink.

plugins.name: Grady - Apply Beautiful Gradients

These gradients add depth to buttons, make backgrounds more interesting, and even shorten the time to apply gradients and other effects!Feel free to leave feedback and if you liked the plugin, just press the ❤️ to show some love :)

plugins.name: Text Changer
plugins.description: Magic Text Replace is a Figma plugin designed to streamline text editing workflows. It allows users to find and replace text across selected layers or the entire document, with options for case sensitivity, whole-word matching, and regular expressions. The plugin also keeps a history of replacements for easy reapplication and provides a preview of text layers for better control.
plugins.tagline: find and replace text in Figma with advanced options like case sensitivity, regex, and more.

124704.name: Text Changer
124704.description: Magic Text Replace is a Figma plugin designed to streamline text editing workflows. It allows users to find and replace text across selected layers or the entire document, with options for case sensitivity, whole-word matching, and regular expressions. The plugin also keeps a history of replacements for easy reapplication and provides a preview of text layers for better control.
124704.tagline: find and replace text in Figma with advanced options like case sensitivity, regex, and more.

plugins.name: Token Swapper
plugins.description: To use it, simply activate the plugin, import any component from any library, and it does the rest! 🚀https://www.loom.com/share/6d526c11f63644318e9c604193e11e3dEffortless Token Swapping Across FilesSwap Design Tokens between your design system and working files in seconds. Maintain consistency without duplicating libraries or styles.Full-page Token ReplacementNeed to update a full design with new tokens? One click with "Swap All" updates every node, text style, and color variable instantly — no manual work required.Intelligent Scan & ReplaceAutomatically scan files for elements not linked to tokens — including colors and fonts — and batch replace them with variables from your design system. Eliminate inconsistencies with a few clicks.Cross-theme & Project FlexibilityManage multiple projects with a single design system source. Token Swapper ensures all visual assets remain connected to their proper tokens, even across brands or themes.Non-destructive WorkflowToken Swapper doesn’t overwrite or break your original styles. Switch between token sets and preview changes without permanent commitment — perfect for testing themes or migrating designs.Smart Query ProcessingLet the plugin process bulk token changes in the background. Your edits persist even when closing the plugin, making large updates smoother and safer.Beta Features: More Power, More ControlOur beta tools let you go even deeper — manage font tokens, swap icons, and process entire pages. Just stay in the same token session for best results while we keep improving.FAQsDoes this work with free Figma plans?Yes! Token Swapper is fully compatible with all Figma plans — free included. No need for professional tiers to keep your tokens in sync.What if I use my own token naming system?That’s okay! As long as your token names and structure match across files, Token Swapper will recognize and replace them intelligently.Why use Token Swapper instead of doing it manually?Manual token swaps are time-consuming, error-prone, and hard to scale. Token Swapper automates the entire process, saving you hours of work and ensuring consistency.Tutorialshttps://www.loom.com/share/3d743648bd3643e5a50b7dff7d54bbf2https://www.loom.com/share/b3a6f11e12734fe18da5d30106fe4c54https://www.loom.com/share/0ec7731eb20f404d9259222377f40cef
plugins.tagline: Swaps font, color and space tokens of components imported from other libraries.

135242.description: To use it, simply activate the plugin, import any component from any library, and it does the rest! 🚀https://www.loom.com/share/6d526c11f63644318e9c604193e11e3dEffortless Token Swapping Across FilesSwap Design Tokens between your design system and working files in seconds. Maintain consistency without duplicating libraries or styles.Full-page Token ReplacementNeed to update a full design with new tokens? One click with "Swap All" updates every node, text style, and color variable instantly — no manual work required.Intelligent Scan & ReplaceAutomatically scan files for elements not linked to tokens — including colors and fonts — and batch replace them with variables from your design system. Eliminate inconsistencies with a few clicks.Cross-theme & Project FlexibilityManage multiple projects with a single design system source. As long as your token names and structure match across files, Token Swapper will recognize and replace them intelligently.Why use Token Swapper instead of doing it manually?Manual token swaps are time-consuming, error-prone, and hard to scale. plugins.name: Icon Resizer
plugins.description: The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you’re working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
plugins.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

118276.name: Icon Resizer
118276.description: The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you’re working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
118276.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

plugins.name: Icon Aliases
plugins.description: NOTE: Run from the page containing your Icon components.Ever got frustrated while searching for a icon with a weird name? plugins.name: VV-Text
plugins.description: 海外项目设计师看过来！使用对照表翻译设计稿时，是不是只能反复的复制粘贴？现在只需两步轻松搞定，快来试试吧！第一步：一键导出原文（导出的CSV文件交给专业的翻译人员进行翻译）第二步：一键导入翻译轻松设计，轻松摸鱼 ^_^-------------------------------------------------------------------------Attention, overseas project designers!When translating design drafts using a comparison table, do you have to rely on repeated copying and pasting?Now it can be easily done in just two steps. Come and give it a try!Step 1: One-click export of original text.(The exported CSV file is handed over to professional translators for translation.)Step 2: One-click import of translation.

plugins.name: Showcase
plugins.description: Showcase makes presenting specific frames to your team effortless. Whether you’re walking through a design or highlighting a particular frame, Showcase lets you do so directly within the canvas, offering smooth flyover animations for a seamless presentation. Independent of the zoom level, you have full control over how close or far you view your frames—adjust zoom as desired.Showcase is also helpful when working with large files that contain many frames. If you ever feel lost in the canvas, Showcase helps you quickly focus on a specific frame by simply selecting it from the layers panel.Showcase is free to use. If you find it helpful, consider supporting the project by buying me a coffee ☕️.

accepted.name: Saleh KAYYALI
accepted.description: Hey 👋🏼  I'm an interaction designer with a passion for nifty productivity tools.

plugins.tagline: Present your Figma frames effortlessly.

plugins.name: StageUp
plugins.description: StageUp allows you to assign statuses to pages in your Figma project with a single click. Choose from options like 'Approved', 'Requires Changes', or 'Work in Progress' to keep track of the current state of your designs.
plugins.tagline: Quick page status updates in Figma

101950.name: StageUp
101950.description: StageUp allows you to assign statuses to pages in your Figma project with a single click. Choose from options like 'Approved', 'Requires Changes', or 'Work in Progress' to keep track of the current state of your designs.
101950.release_notes:
Release Notes v1.1.2
Fixed: An issue where applying statuses to elements with numerical names would incorrectly modify or remove the numerical values. Elements with names starting with digits now retain their names correctly when a status is applied.
101950.tagline: Quick page status updates in Figma

plugins.name: AI Coach
plugins.description: GPTCoach est ton assistant virtuel intégré à Figma, conçu pour te guider à chaque étape de ton processus de design. Grâce à l’intelligence artificielle avancée de GPT-4, il analyse tes créations et te propose des conseils personnalisés pour améliorer tes interfaces, affiner ton UX, et t’aider à résoudre les défis de design les plus complexes. Que tu sois débutant ou expert, GPTCoach libère ta créativité en rendant le design plus intuitif, efficace et magique.
plugins.tagline: Ton assistant créatif dans Figma en utilisant votre GPT4o.

plugins.name: Lindi for Tawakkalna
plugins.description: Lindi revolutionizes the way UI/UX designs are created by leveraging advanced artificial intelligence to automate and enhance the design process. Users can rapidly prototype, iterate, and finalize visually appealing and user-friendly UI/UX designs.This plugin is solely made for Tawakkalna Services allowing entities to build flows and designs with Tawakkalna's Design System rules.The Plugin generates and transfers ready made designs from Lindi - The AI Designer to Figma allowing designers to view, create, and modify the contents of the files in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Design Smarter, Build Faster: Empowering UI/UX with AI precision.

plugins.name: FlowShot - MP4/GIF Export Prototypes
plugins.description: Capture your Figma prototype flows — effortlessly.FlowShot turns your interactive designs into smooth, high-quality videos with just a few clicks. No screen recording, no cropping, no stress.Powered by an open-source core using Playwright, TypeScript, and FFmpeg — and built to scale, FlowShot lets you export your prototype flows exactly as they look and feel inside Figma.Whether you're a designer sharing interactions, or a developer demoing a product, FlowShot gives you clean visuals you can trust.👉 Customize export settings👉 Record any flow, in any size👉 Use locally or connect to your own serverFree, open source, and built by someone who needed this tool too.Visit Official Website | Github | By CodeIdeal
plugins.tagline: Export Figma Prototypes and Flows into MP4/GIF/WEBM video FREE & Open Source

136963.name: FlowShot - MP4/GIF Export Prototypes
136963.description: Capture your Figma prototype flows — effortlessly.FlowShot turns your interactive designs into smooth, high-quality videos with just a few clicks. No screen recording, no cropping, no stress.Powered by an open-source core using Playwright, TypeScript, and FFmpeg — and built to scale, FlowShot lets you export your prototype flows exactly as they look and feel inside Figma.Whether you're a designer sharing interactions, or a developer demoing a product, FlowShot gives you clean visuals you can trust.👉 Customize export settings👉 Record any flow, in any size👉 Use locally or connect to your own serverFree, open source, and built by someone who needed this tool too.Visit Official Website | Github | By CodeIdeal

networkAccess.reasoning: localhost is needed for connecting to the core FlowShot API server for recording functionality. flowshot.codeideal.com is needed for loading assets, setup guides, and plugin resources.

136963.tagline: Export Figma Prototypes and Flows into MP4/GIF/WEBM video FREE & Open Source

plugins.name: Figma Frame History
plugins.description: This tool enables version-controlled frame history management directly on the page. It offers four key commands:• Major Version: Select a BASE NODE on the page and execute this command. A NEW NODE will be created right after the BASE NODE, with a version control suffix in its name (e.g., Frame_1.0 → Frame_v2.0).• Minor Version: Similar to the **Major Version** command, but only the minor version number is incremented by 1 (e.g., Frame_1.0 → Frame_v1.1).• Unlock History: This command unlocks all previously locked frames in the history, restoring them to their default style.• Lock History: This command locks all history frames again, making them transparent.If the BASE NODE name does not include a version control suffix _${majorVersion}.${minorVersion}, the NEW NODE name will default to ${baseNodeName}_v1.0 when either the Major Version or Minor Version command is executed.

accepted.name: RyanHuang 👀
accepted.description:
🔸 Product Designer
🔸 Heavy user of Figma
🔸 Beginner in FE

plugins.tagline: A frame history management tool for creating and organizing frame versions directly on the page

123378.name: Figma Frame History
123378.description: This tool enables version-controlled frame history management directly on the page. A NEW NODE will be created right after the BASE NODE, with a version control suffix in its name (e.g., Frame_1.0 → Frame_v2.0).• Minor Version: Similar to the **Major Version** command, but only the minor version number is incremented by 1 (e.g., Frame_1.0 → Frame_v1.1).• Unlock History: This command unlocks all previously locked frames in the history, restoring them to their default style.• Lock History: This command locks all history frames again, making them transparent.If the BASE NODE name does not include a version control suffix _${majorVersion}.${minorVersion}, the NEW NODE name will default to ${baseNodeName}_v1.0 when either the Major Version or Minor Version command is executed.
123378.tagline: A frame history management tool for creating and organizing frame versions directly on the page

plugins.name: tokenXtractor - by techworks studio
plugins.description: tokenXtractor is a Figma plugin thoughtfully crafted to make exporting local variables, or tokens, easy and accessible. Its usage is fairly straightforward: configure your options, select your collections, and then download them.1) Configure your optionsCase StyleExport Single FileExport Format2) Select your collectionsAll collections are selected by default, so if you would like to export all your collections, you can skip this step. Otherwise, click on the variable collection name to select / deselect it for export.You can select multiple using CMD + Click (MacOS) or CTRL + Click (Windows). To select a range, click the first collection and then SHIFT + Click the last collection.You can undo your selection by clicking the 'RESET' button next to 'Collections?'3) Download your tokensFinally, press the 'DOWNLOAD TOKENS' button, save the zip file where you'd like, and then unzip the file to access your exported tokens.Previewing + Misc. TipsThe right half of the plugin contains a 'preview' of the tokens to be exported. When exporting multiple files, you can use the dropdown menu next to 'Previewing' to switch the collection you're viewing.------------------------------Brought to you by techworks.studio------------------------------
plugins.tagline: Export local variables to code-ready files

113188.name: tokenXtractor - by techworks studio

Otherwise, click on the variable collection name to select / deselect it for export.You can select multiple using CMD + Click (MacOS) or CTRL + Click (Windows). To select a range, click the first collection and then SHIFT + Click the last collection.You can undo your selection by clicking the 'RESET' button next to 'Collections?'3) Download your tokensFinally, press the 'DOWNLOAD TOKENS' button, save the zip file where you'd like, and then unzip the file to access your exported tokens.Previewing + Misc. plugins.name: Avctoris Copyright
plugins.description: The Avctoris Copyright plugin for Figma is a comprehensive tool designed to help creators protect and manage their intellectual property rights effortlessly. With this plugin, users can seamlessly generate a PDF certificate of their design work directly from their Figma workspace, ensuring that their creations are legally safeguarded.Key Features:Automated PDF Generation: Export your design assets into a PDF format for easy documentation and protection.Intellectual Property Management: Record detailed information about the authors and holders of rights for each creation.Secure Registration: Easily submit your work for copyright registration and receive a certificate, ensuring your designs are legally protected.User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive UI integrated into Figma, allowing for a smooth and seamless experience.Real-Time Collaboration: Continue collaborating on designs while managing copyrights without leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Where Ideas Come to Life

plugins.name: Unidup
plugins.description: Create a design set template that includes component usage and color schemes. With this plugin, you can duplicate your template to a new page, automatically apply new instances of the original component's new variants under consistent layers, and create brand new color schemes.Additionally, color schemes can be exported in JSON format.Document PreparationDocument Structure: Prepare the design drafts of the design scheme, which should include "Components Page" and "Template Page", as well as "Color Scheme".Naming: Each reuse of the design scheme should have a unique name, let's tentatively call it "NAME". This naming is very important as it runs through the entire reuse process.Template Page: The "Template Page" is the page of your design scheme, and its name should be called NAME. It will play a big role in subsequent work, transforming into various new outputs and serving various new purposes. Therefore, each artboard should contain instances of components for reuse.Components Page: Each time the design scheme is reused, the output should be unique. The "Components Page" contains unique elements in each set of outputs, and each component should include variants, with the key of the variant being "name" and the value being NAME, to correspond with each set of outputs.Color Scheme: The naming method for local color schemes in figma is xxx/xxx. When naming, please follow the structure NAME/color1, NAME/color2.How to UseDuplicate and Export JSON are two main functions.Duplicate: There are three cards in the interface, namely "Components Page", "From Template", and "New Page Naming".Select your "Components Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "Components Page", and the card will display the details of the "Components Page".Select your "Template Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "From template", and the card will display the details of the "Template Page".In the "New Page Naming" card, name your new output.Click the "Duplicate" button, and you have extended a new output from the "Template Page". Modify the associated components and color scheme, and this output is ready.Export JSON:It will list the NAME of all your output schemes, click to export the rgba color values, and download the json to your local.See usage demo file:https://www.figma.com/file/jUg3U53QSIzWBEn0RfUdB0/
plugins.tagline: Unidup - An easy way to reuse your design set

85400.name: Unidup
85400.description: Create a design set template that includes component usage and color schemes. With this plugin, you can duplicate your template to a new page, automatically apply new instances of the original component's new variants under consistent layers, and create brand new color schemes.Additionally, color schemes can be exported in JSON format.Document PreparationDocument Structure: Prepare the design drafts of the design scheme, which should include "Components Page" and "Template Page", as well as "Color Scheme".Naming: Each reuse of the design scheme should have a unique name, let's tentatively call it "NAME". This naming is very important as it runs through the entire reuse process.Template Page: The "Template Page" is the page of your design scheme, and its name should be called NAME. plugins.name: Accessibility Checker
plugins.description: Make your designs accessible to everyone with this comprehensive accessibility checker. This plugin combines automated testing with guided manual review to ensure your designs meet accessibility standards.🔍 AUTOMATED CHECKS- Text contrast analysis against backgrounds- Font size verification for readability- Overlapping elements detection- Missing alt text detection✅ INTERACTIVE CHECKLISTTrack your progress with a persistent checklist covering key accessibility criteria:- Contrast and readability- Color usage and clarity- Image descriptions and alt text- Language simplicity- Animation limits- Overall design clarity💡 EDUCATIONAL RESOURCESEach accessibility issue includes a direct link to relevant WCAG guidelines and best practices to help you learn while you design.Perfect for designers who want to create more inclusive products and ensure compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1). This plugin makes accessibility checking a seamless part of your design workflow rather than an afterthought.Whether you're new to accessibility or an experienced designer, this tool helps you identify and fix issues early in the design process, saving development time and creating better experiences for all users.
plugins.tagline: Create accessible designs with automated checks and guided review

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly replace text fields and components with accurate web3 addresses into your designs

118163.name: Wallet Writer
118163.description: Automate the generation of verified Ethereum and Solana wallet addresses, allowing you to accurately populate multiple text layers and components in one swift action. Designed to streamline your design workflow, ChainFiller eradicates the tediousness of manual copy and paste, minimising errors and ensuring efficiency. Whether you’re prototyping or finalising your project, Wallet Writer is the perfect tool to embed authentic Web3 functionality into your creative process.

networkAccess.reasoning: Required for Web3 libraries (ethers.js and @solana/web3.js) to generate cryptographically secure wallet addresses

118163.tagline: Effortlessly replace text fields and components with accurate web3 addresses into your designs

plugins.name: Margin Detective
plugins.description: Say goodbye to inconsistencies and hello to perfectly aligned designs. With Margin Detective, you get a vigilant partner that scans your frames, checks margins and spacings, and ensures they align with your document variables. When something’s off, it offers smart corrections or swaps, keeping your design cohesive and professional.Whether you’re fine-tuning layouts or auditing a massive project, Margin Detective empowers you to maintain flawless alignment, harmony, and consistency—all with the efficiency of a true design detective.Design smarter. Stay consistent. Every pixel, every time.
plugins.tagline: Detect. Correct. Perfect your design.

plugins.name: Sri lankan Name Generator
plugins.description: This plugin allows users to generate unique Sri Lankan names based on gender and ethnicity. It's ideal for creating culturally relevant and diverse placeholder names for mockups, wireframes, or design projects. Users can select from Sinhala, Tamil, Muslim, or Burgher names for both genders, ensuring inclusivity and variety in your designs. Easily apply names to text layers with just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: Generate authentic Sri Lankan names by gender and ethnicity for your designs and projects.

120719.release_notes:
Release Notes for Version 2

🎨 New Modern UI: Updated the plugin interface with a sleek dark theme and improved layout.

🚀 Better User Experience: Added rounded buttons, smooth transitions, and interactive elements.

🔄 Fixed Scrolling Issues: The plugin height is now fixed with no unwanted scrolling.
